marklogic.body: Parliament has criminals for 2 reasons; 1) All major political parties are hungry for black money to fund elections (read cash, wine for voters) & personal luxury of party high command. As a result they give election ticket to only those who can Ensure smooth flow of black money, 2) Indian voters are 99% corrupt themselves & therefore vote only those who can get them more benefits than others (thru legal or illegal means they dont care). Example if a local politician does not help voters get illegal power connection (katiya) or restore it after power corp disconnected by Burning buses, power stations & other violent means, people will not vote for him.
